channel.title: Gender Changing [508]
channel.description: I've recently downloaded Berky's 508 server and been testing stuff like items, NPC's tele's etc. I also tried testing changing gender. ::char and ::female dont work and neither does Make-over mage. Any suggestions how people can change there look and gender when they 1st login and when ever they want after that?

item.title: Gender Changing [508]

item.description:
@Rii0N wrote:

I’ve recently downloaded Berky’s 508 server and been testing stuff like items, NPC’s tele’s etc.
I also tried testing changing gender. ::char and ::female dont work and neither does
Make-over mage. Any suggestions how people can change there look and gender when they
1st login and when ever they want after that?

Read full topic
